main event: A stationary round, saucer-shaped object was observed glowing red and performing maneuvers in the sky near Beloit, Wisconsin.
interesting points: The object glowed brighter than dimmed,The observation lasted between 35 to 40 minutes,The observer initially thought the object was a balloon,The object performed multiple maneuvers including disappearing into clouds and returning to a stationary position,The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
witness description: male, approximately 50 years old, detailed and attentive to the observation
